title: Two sermons preached the one at S. Maries Spittle on Tuesday in Easter weeke. 1570. and the other at the Court at Windsor the Sonday after twelfth day, being the viij. of Ianuary, before in the yeare. 1569. by Thomas Drant Bacheler in Diuinitie.
author: Drant, Thomas, d. 1578?
publisher: By Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
